name: Jibbo!
description:
This is Jibbo.

Help Jibbo get to his family whilst navigating basic block structures.

Hello, This is actually my second game that I wanted to submit to this GameJam. The first game was actually a horror and suspense 3D based game, but unfortunately it didn't really come up to fruition.  My main goal was to get a game into this huge GameJam, so I technically did do so. I'm hoping very much that the horror game I get to submit as some sort of Post-Jam kind of thing. 

Sorry for the extremely rushed nature of the game.
